hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
select mPosSettingsMaster.Id, mPosSettingsMaster.Section, mPosSettingsMaster.[Key], mPosSettingsValues.Value as 'SettingValue'
from mPosSettingsMaster
left join mPosSettingsValues on mPosSettingsMaster.Id=mPosSettingsValues.SettingId
WHERE (mPosSettingsMaster.IsGlobal =1 AND mPosSettingsValues.PosName='') OR (NOT mPosSettingsMaster.IsGlobal =1 AND mPosSettingsValues.PosName = :posName)
